headline.main: One Month Into the Afghan War

lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''U.S. Moves to Cut 2 Financial Links for Terror Group'' (front page, Nov. 8): It should be noted that a large portion of these assets flow from money that Middle East countries get from oil sold to the West, especially the United States.
abstract: Nitin B Kulkarni letter comments on November 8 article on US moves to cut two financial links to terror groups
